database

Class HyPeerWebDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.HyPeerWebDatabase

  • public class HyPeerWebDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton that creates easy access data in the connected database.
    Author:
    Craig Jacobson

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()

      • initHyPeerWebDatabase

        public static void initHyPeerWebDatabase()
        Creates or loads the default HyPeerWebDatabase.

      • initHyPeerWebDatabase

        public static void initHyPeerWebDatabase(java.lang.String dbName)
        Creates or loads a HyPeerWebDatabase. Should be one of the first things called when creating a HyPeerWeb.
        Parameters:
        dbName - The name of the database. Must be valid, null, or empty.
        Pre-condition:
        dbName = null OR |dbName| = 0 OR dbName is valid
        Post-condition:
        IF dbName == null OR |dbName| = 0 new HyPeerWebDatabase(DEFAULT_DATABASE_NAME) ELSE new HyPeerWebDatabase(dbName)

      • getSingleton

        public static HyPeerWebDatabase getSingleton()
        Gets the single HyPeerWebDatabase.
        Returns:
        The HyPeerWebDatabase singleton.
        Pre-condition:
        initHyPeerWebDatabase() must have been called previously to ensure that result != null
        Post-condition:
        result = singleton

      • getNode

        public SimplifiedNodeDomain getNode(int webId)
        Creates a SimplifiedNodeDomain representing the node with indicated webId. The information is retrieved from the database.
        Parameters:
        webId - The webId of the node whose information will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The SimplifiedNodeDomain corresponding to the webId.
        Pre-condition:
        There exists a node in the database with the given webId.
        Post-condition:
        result contains the webId, neighbors, upPointers, downPointers, fold, surrogateFold, and inverse surrogate fold and state of the indicated node.

      • getAllWebIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAllWebIds()
        Returns a list of all the web ids currently stored in the database.

      • storeNode

        public void storeNode(Node node)
        Stores the node and all of that nodes references.
        Parameters:
        node - - The node being stored

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Removes all the data in the tables from the database. (The schema skeleton is left behind, ready to start adding things to it again)
